sentences.sContent: Copper and zinc are fused to make brass.
sentences.sContent_eng: Copper and zinc are fused to make brass.
sentences.sCn: 铜与锌熔合后形成黄铜。

sentences.sContent: Some microbes like nothing better than to be nestled in a toxic sludge of heavy metals like zinc, arsenic and cadmium.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some microbes like nothing better than to be nestled in a toxic sludge of heavy metals like zinc, arsenic and cadmium.
sentences.sCn: 对于一些微生物而言，没有什么比生活在充满了锌、砷和镉之类的重金属的有毒淤泥中更加惬意的。

trans.tranCn: 镀锌于…；涂锌于…；用锌处理

trans.tranOther: a blue-white metal that is used to make brass and to cover and protect objects made of iron. It is a chemical element: symbol Zn
